params._amount: Amount of the currency being used for the bid.
params._currencyAddress: Address of currency being used to bid.
params._originContract: Contract address of asset being bid on.

params._currencyAddress: The currency address for the bid
params._merkleRoot: The root hash of the Merkle tree
params._originContract: The contract address of the token
params._proof: The Merkle proof verifying token inclusion
params._tokenId: The ID of the token being bid on

returns._0: Auction Struct: creatorAddress, creationBlock, startingTime, lengthOfAuction, currencyAddress, minimumBid, splitRecipients array, and splitRatios array.

returns.amount: The amount of the current highest bid
returns.bidder: The address of the current highest bidder
returns.currencyAddress: The currency address of the bid
returns.marketplaceFeeAtTime: The marketplace fee percentage at the time of the bid

returns._0: The MerkleAuctionConfig struct containing the auction configuration
The current nonce for this token

params._origin: The contract address of the token
params._root: The Merkle root to check against

returns._0: True if the token is included in the root, false otherwise

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._currency: The currency address for the auction
params._duration: The length of the auction in seconds
params._merkleRoot: The root hash of the Merkle tree containing token IDs
params._splitAddresses: The addresses to split the proceeds with
params._splitRatios: The ratios for each split address

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._auctionLengthExtension: The new auction length extension in seconds

params._maxAuctionLength: The new maximum auction length in seconds

params._minimumBidIncreasePercentage: The new minimum bid increase percentage

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

bid(address,uint256,address,uint128).notice: Places a bid on a running auction.

bidWithAuctionMerkleProof(address,addres.notice: Places a bid using a Merkle proof to verify token inclusion

cancelAuctionMerkleRoot(bytes32).notice: Cancels a previously registered Merkle root

getAuctionDetails(address,uint256).notice: Grabs the current auction details for a token.

getCreatorAuctionMerkleRootNonce(address.notice: Gets the current nonce for a user's Merkle root

getCurrentBid(address,uint256).notice: Gets the current bid details for a specific token

getMerkleAuctionConfig(address,bytes32).notice: Gets the Merkle auction configuration for a given creator and root

getTokenAuctionNonce(address,bytes32,add.notice: Gets the nonce for a specific token under a Merkle root

getUserAuctionMerkleRoots(address).notice: Gets all Merkle roots registered by a user

isTokenInRoot(bytes32,address,uint256,by.notice: Verifies if a token is included in a Merkle root

registerAuctionMerkleRoot(bytes32,addres.notice: Registers a new Merkle root for auction configuration

setMinimumBidIncreasePercentage(uint8).notice: Sets the minimum bid increase percentage

settleAuction(address,uint256).notice: Settles an auction that has ended.
